title: Freezing on acceptance of 'Queue Popping'
body: Have been placed on a 30:00 Minute Blocked Queue time due to my client 'acting out of order' The Queue will pop for the "ready check" after pressing the ready option, Client freezes on the next image slide, then proceeds to say that I did not 'ready up'. Have re-logged multiple times, closed down every background program (music, voice programs, other games, etc.) If anyone knows how to solve would be much appreciated. Thanks!

replies.body:
Is this happening on both Clients or is this just happening on the *Beta Client*? I'd like you to test this in both clients, as some players have reported this being exclusive to the Beta.

Let me know what you find.
